sentences.en: He didn't attend that meeting under the pretext of sickness.
sentences.cn: 他以生病为借口,没参加那个会议.

sentences.en: He excused himself on the pretext of a stomach upset.
sentences.cn: 他借口自己胃不舒服离开了。

sentences.en: He remained home on [ under ] the pretext of being sick.
sentences.cn: 他以生病为借口 [ 托辞生病 ] 留在家里.

sentences.en: He remained home on [ under ] the pretext that he was sick.
sentences.cn: 他用生病的托辞 [ 借口 ] 留在家里.

sentences.en: He used his headache as a pretext for not going to school.
sentences.cn: 他借口头疼而不去上学.

sentences.en: He used his research as a pretext for travelling to Hungary.
sentences.cn: 他以做研究为名到匈牙利去旅游.

sentences.en: He used his sore throat as a pretext for not going to school.
sentences.cn: 他以喉痛作为不去学校的借口.

sentences.en: He used his sore throat as a pretext for not going to shool.
sentences.cn: 他假托喉痛不到校上课.

sentences.en: He’ll phone on some pretext or other.
sentences.cn: 他会以这样或那样的理由打电话的。

sentences.en: I was going to have him called away from the house on some pretext or other.
sentences.cn: 我准备找个什么借口把他从屋里支出去。

sentences.en: John left early under the pretext of illness.
sentences.cn: 今天约翰以生病为藉口,提早离开了.

sentences.en: The boy refuses to go to school on [ under ] the pretext of illness [ an ailment, sickness ].
sentences.cn: 这孩子装病不去 上学.

sentences.en: The incident was used as a pretext for intervention in the area.
sentences.cn: 这次事件成了干涉那个地区的借口。

sentences.en: They wanted a pretext for subduing the region by force.
sentences.cn: 他们想找借口用武力征服这个地区。

sentences.en: They would now find some dubious pretext to restart the war.
sentences.cn: 他们现在会找个蹩脚的借口重新发动战争。

sentences.en: This provided a pretext for the authorities to cancel the elections.
sentences.cn: 这给当局取消此次选举提供了借口。

trans.tran_en: a false reason given for an action, in order to hide the real reason
